contents:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Orders affirmed. See also In Re Investigating Grand Jury of Philadelphia County: Appeal of Richard Drapczuk, 495 Pa. 186, 433 A.2d 5 (1981).
O’BRIEN, C. J., and Mr. Justice KAUFFMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of these cases.
LARSEN, J., filed a dissenting opinion.
